entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
